duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform all-purpose cleaning and preservation of assigned areas in a building or multiple client sites.
Empty and clean waste containers, remove waste paper and garbage, and damp wipe containers.
Dust, vacuum, and clean all office furnishings, fixtures, and surfaces.
Clean and sanitize bathrooms, restock supplies, and ensure building floors are clean.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 6 months of experience in a janitorial type position.
